body.name: Iaret Smart Watches for Women, 1.85" Smart Watch (Answer/Make Calls) with 100 Sports Modes, Fitness Tracker Heart Rate Sleep Monitor Pedometer Calories, Waterproof Fitness Watch for Android iPhone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 17 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 5 hrs 17 mins
features: 200 Dials & 3 Straps: IARET women's smart watch features a 1.85" HD touch screen for a unique visual and interactive experience. With 200+ watch faces and the option to set a personal photo as a wallpaper. The womens watch comes with three bands in different colors and materials. The rose gold stainless steel strap adds elegance, while pink and purple silicone options offer a casual look suitable for sports and daily wear. Easily switch to complement different outfits and scenes.

Watches for Women: The smart heart rate monitor watch prioritizes women's health, offering precise tracking of blood pressure, heart rate, blood oxygen, and sleep stages (Deep/Light sleep/Awake) through continuous 24-hour health monitoring. Additional features include monitoring menstrual cycles, safe periods, ovulation, and ovulation days, along with hydration reminders, sedentary alerts, and guided breathing exercises for a holistic approach to well-being. A thoughtful gifts for women!

100+ Sports Fitness Tracker: The women's fitness watch offers 100+ sports modes, including running, cycling, and yoga, recording real-time data such as heart rate, steps, calories, and distance. Utilizing your phone's GPS, it maps your movement path. Set personalized sport goals for motivation. For fitness enthusiasts, the activity trackers and smartwatches provide comprehensive workout data, ensuring a more meaningful exercise experience with its diverse sports modes.

Bluetooth Call & Message Reminder: The digital watch, compatible with iOS and Android, enables clear calls and message management via Bluetooth. Featuring an HD speaker, it ensures you never miss calls during activities. Add 10 contacts for quick access. Using Bluetooth 5.3 for stability, this callable android smart watch efficiently delivers notifications from apps like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok. Additionally, it allows control of your phone's voice assistant for hands-free convenience.

Long Battery Life & Multi-Functions: The smart watch for Android phones and iPhones ensures a seamless smart life, powered by a 270mAh battery that can be fully charged in 2 hours. With 3-7 days of uninterrupted use, it's an ideal companion for business trips. Featuring IP67 waterproof technology, these ladies watches effortlessly handle daily activities. The smartwatch enhance functionality with practical tools such as a calculator, alarm clock, music control, stopwatch, find phone, and more.
body.description: Introducing the IARET Women's Smart Watch - where elegance meets functionality. Elevate your daily routine with this sleek and versatile accessory designed to enhance every aspect of your life. **Stunning Display and Customization:** Experience a visual and interactive feast on the 1.85" HD touch screen. Choose from over 200 watch faces or personalize your watch with a cherished photo as your wallpaper. The set includes three interchangeable bands - a rose gold stainless steel strap for an elegant touch, and pink and purple silicone options for a sporty or casual look. Effortlessly switch between bands to complement different outfits and occasions. **Prioritizing Women's Health:** Our smart heart rate monitor watch is tailored to prioritize women's health. Precisely track blood pressure, heart rate, blood oxygen, and sleep stages through 24-hour health monitoring. Monitor menstrual cycles, safe periods, ovulation, and hydration reminders for a holistic approach to well-being. The perfect thoughtful gift for the women in your life. **Comprehensive Sports Tracker:** Unleash the fitness enthusiast in you with 100+ sports modes, including running, cycling, yoga, and more. Record real-time data like heart rate, steps, calories, and distance. Set personalized sport goals for motivation and utilize your phone's GPS to map your movement path. Achieve a more meaningful exercise experience with our diverse sports modes. **Seamless Connectivity:** Stay connected with the Bluetooth call and message reminder feature. Compatible with iOS and Android, this watch ensures clear calls and efficient message management. With an HD speaker and Bluetooth 5.3 stability, you'll never miss a call during activities. Manage notifications from popular apps like Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and control your phone's voice assistant for hands-free convenience. **Long Battery Life and Multi-Functions:** Designed for a seamless smart life, our watch boasts a 270mAh battery that fully charges in just 2 hours. Enjoy 3-7 days of uninterrupted use, making it the perfect companion for business trips. With IP67 waterproof technology, this watch effortlessly handles daily activities. Explore practical tools such as a calculator, alarm clock, music control, stopwatch, find phone, and more. Elevate your style and well-being with the IARET Women's Smart Watch - a perfect blend of fashion and function.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got the rose gold band. Pretty, classy and very big. Heavy too. Not enough instructions on how to use. Not Senior freindly. Very hard to hear or be heard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars battery very short lasting
reviews.reviewText: I have had this watch for 2 days and the battery is very low already. that means I have to charge it every other day. the smart watch i had to 2 years would last at least a week between charging ...
